edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.task.EventLabels

Packages that use EventLabels
edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.task Demonstrates some capabilities of the Trull Task framework (run timer demo run simple task demo run complex task demo).  
 

Uses of EventLabels in edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.task
 

Classes in edu.luc.cs.trull.demo.task that implement EventLabels
 class ComplexDemo
          An example involving a more complex component with multiple tasks at the leaves.
 class ProgressComponent
           
 class SimpleDemo
          This example demonstrates how a task can be controlled and monitored using a simple user interface and a Trull component as the control logic.
 class TimerDemo
          This example demonstrates how a Swing timer can be placed under the control of a suitable Trull component.
